Type.BattleDialog: It’s a good opportunity to test out our latest design!
I don’t think we should underestimate them.
Is this gonna be okay…? We put it together it correctly, right?
Nice! Let’s compile and report the results to our master.
Hmm… The grip was a tad bit unsatisfactory.
I was an idiot… Shouldn’t have relied on this junk to fight…!
Can’t let myself get distracted by accidents like that…
Panicking here won’t do any good.
Think I’ll give up already? Oh you’ll see…
I’m not used to the controls… But I think I’m getting the hang of it, yeah?
I knew this would be a flawless masterpiece!
I might have blown up some stuff if I tested this out inside the workshop. Haha!
